text: Kare-ra wa chijō o tabi shite, kansatsu shinakatta no ka. Kare-ra izen no mono no ketsumatsu ga dōdeatta ka o. Kare-ra (horobosa reta min) wa, korera (makka no tashinkyō to) yori mo tasū de,-ryoku mo sugure, chijō no iseki mo ōi. Soredemo, kare-ra no kaseida koto wa, nani no yaku ni mo tatanakatta
